mapper.select: SELECT c.user_id, c.calendar_type, c.calendar_event_title, c.calendar_event_bgn_date, c.calendar_event_location, c.calendar_event_detail, c.calendar_create_at, c.calendar_sn, c.task_checked_val FROM tb_calendar c WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} and c.calendar_type = '3' ORDER BY c.calendar_event_bgn_date
SELECT cust_nm, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTRING(cust_rrn FROM 1 FOR 6), 'YYMMDD'), 'MM-DD') AS cust_birthday, cust_id FROM tb_customer WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT ON (dp.dsgn_sn) (SELECT tc.cust_nm FROM tb_customer tc WHERE tc.cust_id = cd.cust_id LIMIT 1) AS cust_nm, dpst_mtr_dt FROM tb_prod_dsgn_dpst dp JOIN tb_custprod_dsgn cd ON dp.dsgn_sn = cd.dsgn_sn where user_id = #{userId};
